title: Himi 255
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko e ‘Eiki ta’ehāmai,
‘A e ‘Afiona, ‘Eiki,
Ka ‘oku ke hā ngāue,
Ki he kakai ‘i māmani.
2.
Ko e langi ‘i ‘olunga,
Mo e fonua ‘i lalo
Mo e me’a kotoa pē,
Ko e ngāue ‘a ho nima.
3.
Pea fonu kotoa pē,
‘I he ngaahi me’a lelei,
Pea ko e me’a ako,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē.
4.
’Oku talu mei mu’a,
Pea ‘oku fai ma’u ai pē,
‘Oku ke keu ‘i ho’o ‘ofa,
Ki he me’a kotoa pē.
5.
Ko ia ‘oku lelei ai,
Pea tu’u mā’oni’oni,
‘A e ngāue kotoa pē,
‘A e ‘Afiona, ‘Eiki. *
